content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s line weight 1 100% merino each skein is 494 yards/ 100 grams approximately 767 yards required this is the color oyster gray - us 2 3 mm straight or circular needles 2 gauge 32 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size before blocking 66 inches long x 6¾ inches wide after blocking 77 inches long x 6¼ inch wide notes click here 3 for a photo tutorial explaining the basic principals of brioche stitch please note that this brioche stitch pattern includes 3 selvedge stitches on each edge when counting stitches in brioche stitch yarn overs are not included in the stitch count they are paired with a knit stitch and the pair of knit/yarn over is counted as a single stitch the stitch pattern will produce a very pronounced rib count only the purl and knit columns when counting stitches slip all slipped stitches purlwise if you adjust this pattern be sure to cast on an odd number of stitches 1 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/brioche-stitch/
